p.01703376c4a81c0e9d91: Triggers a control-flow on value change.
p.01703376c4a81c0e9d92:
This functions triggers the output control flow every time the value of the input data flow changes.
*Advanced Usage Note: changes are detected in the vast majority of cases, but some exceptions may occur. This can happen when the brick providing the `Value` input modifies a given object instead of generating new objects (ex: the same Array is sent multiple times, but with updated content). Make sure that a new object is sent each time.*
A replication of the input data-flow.
